verses.verse: There is therefore <S%G686><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> condemnation <S%G2631><s%> to them which are <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, who walk <S%G4043><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> has made <S%G1659><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> free <S%G1659><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> could not do <S%G102><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> it was weak <S%G770><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, God <S%G2316><s%> sending <S%G3992><s%> his own <S%G1438><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the likeness <S%G3667><s%> of sinful <S%G266><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>, condemned <S%G2632><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>:

That <S%G2443><s%> the righteousness <S%G1345><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>, who walk <S%G4043><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> they that are <S%G5607><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> do mind <S%G5426><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> they that are after <S%G2596><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> to be <S%G5427><s%> carnally <S%G4561><s%> minded <S%G5427><s%> is death <S%G2288><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> to be <S%G5427><s%> spiritually <S%G4151><s%> minded <S%G5427><s%> is life <S%G2222><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%>.

Because <S%G1360><s%> the carnal <S%G4561><s%> mind <S%G5427><s%> is enmity <S%G2189><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G5293><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> subject <S%G5293><s%> to the law <S%G3551><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, neither <S%G3761><s%> indeed <S%G1063><s%> can be <S%G1410><s%>.
So then <S%G1161><s%> they that are <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> please <S%G700><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, if it is so that <S%G1512><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> lives <S%G3611><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>. But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of him that raised up <S%G1453><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> lives <S%G3611><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, he that raised up <S%G1453><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> shall <S%G2227><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> quicken <S%G2227><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> mortal <S%G2349><s%> bodies <S%G4983><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> that dwells <S%G1774><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>.

Therefore <S%G3767><s%>, brothers <S%G80><s%>, we are <S%G2070><s%> debtors <S%G3781><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> to the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, to live <S%G2198><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you live <S%G2198><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, you shall <S%G3195><s%> die <S%G599><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you <S%G2289><s%> through the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> do mortify <S%G2289><s%> the deeds <S%G4234><s%> of the body <S%G4983><s%>, you shall live <S%G2198><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> as many as <S%G3745><s%> are led <S%G71><s%> by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, they <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> the sons <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> you have <S%G2983><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of bondage <S%G1397><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> you have received <S%G2983><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of adoption <S%G1722><s%>, by which <S%G3739><s%> we cry <S%G2896><s%>, Abba <S%G5><s%>, Father <S%G3962><s%>.

The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> itself <S%G846><s%> bears witness with <S%G4828><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> the sons <S%G5043><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>:

And <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> sons <S%G5043><s%>, then <S%G2532><s%> heirs <S%G2818><s%>; heirs <S%G2818><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> joint-heirs <S%G4789><s%> with Christ <S%G5547><s%>; if it is that <S%G1512><s%> we suffer with <S%G4841><s%> him <S%G2443><s%>, that we may be <S%G4888><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> glorified together <S%G4888><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I consider <S%G3049><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the sufferings <S%G3804><s%> of <S%G2540><s%> this present <S%G3568><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> are not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to be compared with <S%G4314><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> which shall <S%G3195><s%> be revealed <S%G601><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> the earnest expectation <S%G603><s%> of the creation <S%G2937><s%> waits for <S%G553><s%> the manifestation <S%G602><s%> of the sons <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the creation <S%G2937><s%> was made subject <S%G5293><s%> to vanity <S%G3153><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> willingly <S%G1635><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> by reason of <S%G1223><s%> him who has subjected <S%G5293><s%> the same in <S%G1909><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%>,

Because <S%G3754><s%> the creation <S%G2937><s%> itself <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> shall be delivered <S%G1659><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the bondage <S%G1397><s%> of corruption <S%G5356><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the glorious <S%G1391><s%> liberty <S%G1657><s%> of the sons <S%G5043><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we are saved <S%G4982><s%> by hope <S%G1680><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> that is seen <S%G991><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> sees <S%G991><s%>, how <S%G5101><s%> can he <S%G1679><s%> <S%G99999><s%> hope for it <S%G1679><s%>?

He that <S%G3739><s%> spared <S%G5339><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> up <S%G3860><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, how <S%G4459><s%> shall he <S%G5483><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> him <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> freely give <S%G5483><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>?

Who <S%G5101><s%> is he that condemns <S%G2632><s%>? It is Christ <S%G5547><s%> that died <S%G599><s%>, Yes <S%G1161><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%>, that is risen <S%G1453><s%> again <S%G2532><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the right hand <S%G1188><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> makes intercession <S%G1793><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> us <S%G2632><s%>.
